Home / Temporary Power / Diesel Generators / Stage V Generators / 40kVA Stage V Generator

40kVA Stage V Generator

Model Number: FQ50K

Product Details

Stage V is an emission standard for non-road mobile machinery (NRMM). It’s a development of previous standards and requires controls, such as diesel particulate filters, to be applied to new machinery.

Stage V engines limit carbon monoxide, nitrogen oxides and hydrocarbons, whilst also reducing the mass of particulate matter (diesel soot) emitted into the atmosphere.

Download Spec sheet

Hire

Temporary power compliant with the latest NRMM Legislation

  • Fully compliant STAGE V engine
  • Ultra-silent compact canopy for extra noise supression
  • Patented Vsi technology
  • Hot dip galvanized enclosure
  • Powder coated
  • Forklift pockets - complete with rubber bumper protection
  • 4 Pole circuit breaker with earth leakage protection
  • 240 litre bunded fuel tank complete with 3 way valve
  • Emergency stop button
  • Low water/Low oil level alarms
  • Battery isolator
  • Deep sea control panel 7310 MKii
  • Lockable canopy for extra security
  • RACOR water seperator filter
  • Copper busbar with microswitch protection over hardwire door
  • Central lift point
  • Socket kit : 1 x 63a 3ph & 2 x 32a 1ph
  • Complete with REMOTE FLEET MONITORING option via DSE Webnet
